item.title: Marex 集团放弃在英国上市，申请在美国上市
item.description: Marex Group Plc 提交了首次公开募股申请，为英国在美国上市的公司增加了一个金融服务平台。【原文：Marex Group Plc filed for an initial public offering, adding the financial services platform to the UK-based firms going public in the US.】

item.title: Sal Mercogliano 谈巴尔的摩大桥垮塌事件
item.description:
一位航运专家谈到了另一场海难的影响。【原文：

A shipping expert speaks to the impact of another maritime disaster.

】

item.title: 加拿大监管机构称银行减少超长期抵押贷款
item.description: 据加拿大银行监管机构称，大流行病期间抵押贷款的迅速增加给金融系统带来了 "风险"，但加拿大贷款机构已开始控制超长住房贷款问题。【原文：The rapid run-up in mortgages during the pandemic represents a “pocket of risk” to the financial system but Canadian lenders are starting to get the problem of ultra-long home loans under control, according to the country’s bank watchdog.】

item.title: 中国秘鲁港口的商业模式面临意外挑战
item.description: 中国斥资 13 亿美元在秘鲁建造的港口正面临着一场突如其来的挑战，可能会颠覆其商业模式，而此时距离今年晚些时候的开港仅有几个月的时间。【原文：China’s $1.3 billion port in Peru is facing a surprise challenge that could upend its business model, just months before its inauguration later this year.】

item.title: 面对高利率，散户投资者举办 "备忘录股票 "派对
item.description: 随着美联储发出令人鼓舞的信息、GameStop 公司的预期收益和高涨的股价点燃了日间交易者的亢奋情绪，零售投资人群又陷入了 "回忆股 "狂热的阵痛之中。【原文：The retail investing crowd is back in the throes of a meme stock mania as encouraging messaging from the Federal Reserve, GameStop Corp.’s expected earnings and sky-high stock prices ignite a euphoria among day traders.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会加强大规模黑客调查，重点关注科技和电信公司
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会正在询问科技和电信公司如何处理 2020 年 SolarWinds 的大规模网络攻击，网络安全行业和大企业纷纷指责该委员会越权。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is asking tech and telecom companies how they handled the sprawling 2020 SolarWinds cyberattack, and drawing fire from the cybersecurity industry and big business for what they call overreach.】

item.title: 加拿大监察机构称王朝黄金公司在中国使用强迫劳工
item.description: 加拿大的一个监督机构要求对王朝黄金公司（Dynasty Gold Corp. ）进行处罚，因为它认为该公司在其中国矿山使用了强迫劳动。【原文：A Canadian watchdog is calling for penalties against Dynasty Gold Corp. after it concluded the company used forced labor at its Chinese mine.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 认为即使美国需求下降，全球燃料市场仍将增长
item.description: 美国第二大炼油商菲利普斯 66 预计，即使美国市场的汽油使用量开始趋于平稳，全球汽车燃料需求仍将持续增长数年。【原文：Phillips 66, the No. 2 US oil refiner, expects global demand for motor fuels to grow for years even as gasoline usage in the US market begins to plateau.】

item.title: DS Smith 正在与国际纸业公司进行收购谈判
item.description: DS Smith Plc 正在讨论被国际纸业公司收购的事宜；在蒙迪公司（Mondi Plc）本月早些时候同意以 51 亿英镑（65 亿美元）的价格收购这家英国包装公司之后，一场可能的竞购战开始了。【原文：DS Smith Plc is in discussions to be taken over by International Paper Co. — starting a possible bidding war for the UK packaging company after Mondi Plc earlier this month agreed to buy it for £5.1 billion ($6.5 billion).】

item.title: 迈阿密城市更新企业为下一阶段开发垃圾公交市场
item.description: 迈阿密世界中心（Miami Worldcenter）是该市市中心的一个城市改造项目，它准备在市政债券市场上借贷 2.45 亿美元，为这个酝酿了近二十年的项目的下一阶段融资。【原文：Miami Worldcenter, an urban renewal project in the city’s downtown, is poised to borrow $245 million in the municipal-bond market as it moves to finance the next phase of a venture that is almost two decades in the making.】

item.title: 芯片制造商的崛起为 S&P 500 指数反弹带来了代价高昂的风险层
item.description: 人工智能热潮席卷股市，令英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）等芯片制造商的股价一路飙升，使它们对更广泛的 S&P 500 指数涨势越来越重要。但这些股票的价格已不再便宜，这为大盘股的进一步上涨增添了新的风险。【原文：The artificial intelligence furor gripping the stock market has the shares of chipmakers like Nvidia Corp. soaring, making them increasingly crucial to the broader S&P 500 Index rally. But the stocks are no longer cheap, adding a new level risk to further gains in the broad equities benchmark.】

item.title: 意大利开始出售 12.5% 的 Paschi 股份，加速图书建设
item.description: 意大利正在出售 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 大约 12.5% 的股份，这是意大利从这家被救助的贷款机构撤资计划的一部分。【原文：Italy is selling about 12.5% of Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA, as part of its plan to divest from the bailed out lender.】

item.title: Blommer 巧克力公司关闭芝加哥工厂后将裁员 226 人
item.description: 可可加工商 Blommer 巧克力公司宣布将关闭拥有 85 年历史的芝加哥工厂，并将裁员数百人。【原文：Cocoa processor Blommer Chocolate Co. is cutting hundreds of jobs after announcing it will close its 85-year-old Chicago factory.】

item.title: Centrica 提高首席执行官薪酬，因为家庭正为能源债务而挣扎
item.description: Centrica Plc 的首席执行官去年获得了丰厚的加薪，而全国数百万家庭却在能源债务中挣扎。【原文：The Chief Executive of Centrica Plc got a bumper pay raise last year while millions of households across the country struggled with energy debt.】

item.title: 墨西哥亿万富翁萨利纳斯的电信债券因交易所交易而飙升
item.description: 墨西哥亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯（Ricardo Salinas）的电信公司 Total Play Telecomunicaciones 的债券飙升至一年来的最高点，几天前，这家互联网和有线电视服务提供商发起了债务交换要约，投资者称这是该公司向重建市场声誉迈出的关键一步。【原文：Bonds from Mexican billionaire Ricardo Salinas’ telecom Total Play Telecomunicaciones soared to the highest in a year, days after the internet and cable provider launched a debt exchange offer that investors said was a crucial step toward rebuilding its reputation with the market】

item.title: Altice 债务之痛有可能给脆弱的 CLO 市场带来混乱
item.description: Altice 的债务困境有可能给杠杆融资市场的一个关键环节造成严重破坏。【原文：Altice’s debt woes threaten to wreak havoc for a crucial cog of the leveraged finance market.】

item.title: 安杜兰的对冲基金在去年创纪录亏损后反弹 20
item.description: 石油交易商皮埃尔-安杜兰（Pierre Andurand）旗下风险最高的对冲基金在去年因错误押注大宗商品而创下 55% 的亏损纪录后，正在反弹。【原文：Oil trader Pierre Andurand’s riskiest hedge fund is bouncing back following last year’s record 55% loss tied to wrong-way bets on the commodity.】

item.title: 巴尔的摩大桥垮塌可能导致煤炭出口受阻数周
item.description: Xcoal Energy & Resources LLC 公司首席执行官 Ernie Thrasher 说，巴尔的摩一座主要桥梁的垮塌很可能导致煤炭出口关闭长达六周之久，并阻碍多达 250 万吨煤炭的运输。【原文：The collapse of a major Baltimore bridge is likely to shut down coal exports for as many as six weeks and block the transport of up to 2.5 million tons of coal, said Ernie Thrasher, chief executive officer of Xcoal Energy & Resources LLC.】

item.title: 做空者押注 110 亿美元，认为加密股票涨势不会持久
item.description: 卖空者仍在押注数十亿美元，认为比特币大涨推动的加密货币相关股票的涨势终将结束。【原文：Short sellers are still betting billions of dollars that the rally in cryptocurrency-linked stocks fueled by a surge in Bitcoin will eventually end.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体现在是最昂贵的美股对赌对象
item.description: 据金融分析公司 S3 Partners 称，与前总统唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体初创公司对赌是市场上最困难、最昂贵的空头交易之一。【原文：Betting against former president Donald Trump’s social media startup is one of the most difficult and expensive short trades in the market, according to financial analytics firm S3 Partners.】

item.title: 商业银行以大流行病以来最快速度购买国债
item.description: 自 2020 年大流行病引发的担忧席卷市场达到顶峰以来，美国银行正以最快的速度抢购国债。加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）的策略师警告说，这种迅猛的速度可能会放缓。【原文：US banks are snapping up Treasuries at the fastest clip since the peak of pandemic-sparked worry swept markets in 2020. Strategists at RBC Capital Markets warn the torrid pace is likely to slow.】

item.title: 抵押贷款经纪商 Meridian 任命前银行业监管者为首席执行官
item.description: 商业抵押贷款经纪商 Meridian Capital 集团任命前银行业监管者布莱恩-布鲁克斯（Brian Brooks）为新任首席执行官兼董事长，以应对市场日益严格的审查。【原文：Commercial mortgage broker Meridian Capital Group named former banking regulator Brian Brooks as its new chief executive officer and chairman as the company seeks to navigate increased scrutiny on the market.】

item.title: 在债券持有人达成协议后，赞比亚的债务解决方案重新转向中国
item.description: 赞比亚历时三年多的努力终于与欧元债券持有人达成协议，摆脱了违约的厄运，主要欠中国贷款人的 35 亿美元商业债务也随之转移。【原文：Zambia’s three-plus-year slog to escape default is shifting to $3.5 billion in commercial debt mainly owed to Chinese lenders, after it finally struck a deal with holders of its eurobonds.】

item.title: 德国 SEFE 公司将接管庞大的天然气电网公司
item.description: 德国国有化的欧洲安全能源有限公司（Securing Energy for Europe GmbH）将成为天然气电网运营商维加公司（Wiga）的唯一所有者，以在政府退出前提高该公司的估值。【原文：Germany’s nationalized Securing Energy for Europe GmbH will become the sole owner of gas grid operator Wiga in an effort to boost the company’s valuation before a government exit.】

item.title: 世界顶级铀矿商寻求扩大对美出口
item.description: 世界最大的铀矿开采国哈萨克斯坦正在 "积极开展工作"，以促进对美国能源公司的金属出口。【原文：Kazakhstan, the world’s largest uranium miner, is conducting “active work” to boost exports of the metal to U.S. energy companies.】

item.title: 路易-德雷福斯交易商将收购巴西最大的速溶咖啡出口商
item.description: 路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.）已同意收购巴西最大的速溶咖啡出口商，这是大宗商品交易商将创纪录的利润投入生产资产的最新例证。【原文：Louis Dreyfus Co. has agreed to buy Brazil’s biggest exporter of instant coffee, the latest example of commodity traders plowing record profits into production assets.】

item.title: 资产支持证券面临美国法院判决带来的新风险
item.description: 联邦法院的一项判决给华尔街将消费贷款捆绑成资产支持证券的一角带来了新的法律风险。【原文：A federal court decision has raised new legal risks for a corner of Wall Street that bundles consumer loans into asset-backed securities.】

item.title: 加拿大鹅裁员 17%，消费者回落趋势持续
item.description: 加拿大鹅控股公司（Canada Goose Holdings Inc.【原文：Canada Goose Holdings Inc. is cutting 17% of its global corporate workforce as it attempts to support long-term growth amid a slowdown in sales.】

item.title: 美联储后交易员 "继续狂欢"，PGIM仍为债券投资组合保驾护航
item.description: 上周，在美联储决策者就今年降息发出令人欣慰的信号后，国债出现了缓解性反弹，帮助市场从会议前的小幅震荡中恢复过来。对格雷格-彼得斯（Greg Peters）来说，这还是老一套。【原文：Treasury bonds staged a relief rally last week after Federal Reserve policymakers sent reassuring signals about rate cuts this year, helping the market recover from a mini-rout leading up to the meeting. For Greg Peters, it was the same old story.】

item.title: 2023 年美联储运营亏损将增至创纪录的 1,143 亿美元
item.description: 美联储 2023 年的支出比收益多出 1 143 亿美元，这是其有史以来最大的经营亏损，迫使美国央行在利率持续走高的情况下放弃向财政部汇款。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s expenses exceeded its earnings in 2023 by $114.3 billion, its largest operating loss ever, forcing the US central bank to forgo remittances to the Treasury as interest rates remain elevated.】
